In summary, Tottenham Hotspur Stadium is characterized by its asymmetric bowl design and innovative roof structure, while Climate Pledge Arena stands out for its net zero carbon certification, setting a new benchmark for sustainable sports facilities.
ground_truth_answer: Tottenham Hotspur Stadium features an asymmetric bowl design by Populous, standing 48 meters high, 200 meters wide, and 250 meters long, with a massive internal area of 119,945 square meters. As for Climate Pledge Arena, it is pioneering environmental standards as the first arena in the world targeting net Zero Carbon certification by the International Living Future Institute. The venue maintains its original 44-million-pound roof to reduce embodied carbon and implements comprehensive sustainability measures including all-electric operations and zero waste initiatives with a minimum 95% waste diversion from landfills.
